releases.name: PhoneGap Desktop Beta 0.4.3
releases.body: If you are downloading the Windows zip, read the installation instructions in the [README](https://github.com/phonegap/phonegap-app-desktop#installation-for-windows) or [INSTALL](https://github.com/phonegap/phonegap-app-desktop/blob/master/INSTALL) files.

releases.name: PhoneGap Desktop Beta 0.2.2
releases.body:
This release has a critical issue that causes the PhoneGap Desktop to not load properly.

See https://github.com/phonegap/phonegap-app-desktop/issues/553#issuecomment-188983077 for more details.

Please use the latest version of [PhoneGap Desktop](https://github.com/phonegap/phonegap-app-desktop/releases).
